function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing fake news, conspiracy theories, and magic cures","Impact":"Increases anxiety, stress, and mistrust in the population","Mitigation":"Proper management of information through reliable and verifiable sources","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, AI algorithms for detecting fake news","People":"General population","Owner":"Media organizations, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Excessive access to information leading to an 'infodemic'","Impact":"Inadequate public health responses, confusion, and mistrust among the population","Mitigation":"Proper management of information through reliable and verifiable sources","Technologies":"Data verification tools, information governance systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities, information providers"},{"Description":"Factors associated with mental health disturbances (e.g., gender, age, income, social networks)","Impact":"Increased symptoms of depression, anxiety, and stress","Mitigation":"Proactive approach to vulnerable groups, social support, reliable information dissemination","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, online support groups","People":"Vulnerable groups (e.g., women, young people, individuals with previous mental illnesses)","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations"}]}
